dc_title_s: Bergen Co. no 3: a series of land grants, leases, and licenses along the Hackensack River, Bergen County, New Jersey, 1877-1941
dc_description_s: This map depicts a series of land grants, leases, and licenses from the years 1877 to 1941 to both individuals and companies in along the Hackensack River in Englewood and Ridgefield Park, Bergen County, New Jersey.|Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection|Date is inferred from latest lease date noted on map.|Untitled. Title created from information on map.|There are two scales given on this map, 1:12000 and 1:31680
